name: Mite (Joshua Day)
description:
This is a very unfinished game. I started it for the Blackthornprod Game Jam #3, and while the scope was already limited (befitting the theme, "Less is more"), I still bit down more than I could chew for one person in a seven-day game jam. Think of this more as a demo that I would like to expand upon in the future.

Use the arrow keys to move, space to jump, and z to interact with other characters.
